title: Evaluate /exit command - exit the REPL
description: Claude Code feature: /exit exits the REPL. In Emacs, could kill the REPL buffer or bury it. Low priority as q or C-x k already work.

title: Consolidate duplicate/overlapping documentation
description: Review docs for overlap: QUEUE.org vs QUEUE-QUICKSTART.org vs QUEUE-IMPLEMENTATION-SUMMARY.org. Consolidate where appropriate, ensure cross-references.

title: Evaluate /compact command - clear history with summary
description: Claude Code feature: /compact clears conversation history while keeping an AI-generated summary in context. Optionally accepts custom summarization instructions. Useful for long sessions approaching context limits.

title: Legal: Add copyright headers to test files
description: From legal review: test/*.el files lack copyright headers. Add standard header with Copyright (C) 2024 Jason Walsh.

title: Security: Fix command injection in shell commands
description: CRITICAL from security review: sage-tools.el shell commands have injection risk. Use shell-quote-argument or process-lines instead of shell-command-to-string with unescaped args.

title: Update research docs (REQUIREMENTS, ROADMAP) for sage.el
description: Review imported research docs from gemini-repl-009. Update titles, references, and content to reflect sage.el naming. Mark completed items, update priorities.

title: L7 Review: Add HTTP request timeout and fix race conditions
description: Critical issues from L7 engineering review: 1) sage.el:312-341 - no timeout on HTTP requests, 2) sage.el:866-897 - race condition in message ordering. Add request-fn timeout parameter and message queue.

title: DevOps: Add SECURITY.md vulnerability disclosure policy
description: From CTO/DevOps review: No security policy exists. Add SECURITY.md with reporting process, response times, and disclosure policy.

title: Evaluate /config command - open config panel
description: Claude Code feature: /config opens a configuration panel. In Emacs, this could open customize-group or a dedicated settings buffer for sage.el configuration.

title: Add proper #+TITLE and metadata to all org files
description: Ensure every org file has: #+TITLE, #+AUTHOR, #+DATE. Add #+OPTIONS for export settings. Standardize header format across all docs.

title: UX: Add slash command tab-completion
description: From CLI UX review: No TAB completion for /commands. Add completion-at-point function for slash commands and their arguments.

title: Fix docstring quoting warnings in elisp files
Evaluate /doctor command - diagnose installation/settings
description: Claude Code feature: /doctor runs diagnostics on installation and settings. Would verify: API keys set, providers reachable, dependencies installed, configuration valid.

title: Create documentation index linking all org files
description: Create a central index (docs/INDEX.org or in README.org) that links to all documentation files with brief descriptions. Organize by category: Core, Features, Reference, Research.

title: Evaluate /export command - export conversation to file/clipboard
description: Claude Code feature: /export saves conversation to file or clipboard. sage-project.el has sage-project-export - may need /export as alias or enhanced clipboard support.

title: Evaluate /context command - visualize context usage grid
description: Claude Code feature: /context displays a colored grid visualization of current context window usage. sage-context.el already has token tracking - this would add visual display.

title: Lint and format all 30 org files for consistency
description: Ensure all org files have proper headers, consistent formatting, and pass org-lint. Check for broken links, missing sections, and formatting issues.

title: DevOps: Add CODE-OF-CONDUCT.md
description: From CTO review: Basic CoC in CONTRIBUTING.org but needs formal CODE-OF-CONDUCT.md with enforcement clause.

title: Remove RENAMING-PLAN.org after rename complete
description: The renaming plan is now complete. Archive or remove RENAMING-PLAN.org to avoid confusion.

title: Security: Move Gemini API key from URL to header
description: CRITICAL from security review: sage.el:183-185 embeds API key in URL query string. Move to Authorization header like OpenAI implementation.

title: Legal: Add LICENSE file (GPL-3.0)
description: CRITICAL from legal review: No LICENSE file exists. Must add GPL-3.0 full text before public release.
